Class NeuralNetBatcher

java.lang.Object
AI.alphazero.batch.NeuralNetBatcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Batcher, Runnable
public class NeuralNetBatcher extends Object implements Runnable, Batcher
A worker that aggregates individual inference requests into efficient batches for processing by a single neural network instance.

It uses a producer-consumer pattern:

  1. Client threads put requests into an input queue.
  2. The batch builder thread drains the queue and forms a batch.
  3. The batch is passed to the inference logic (likely on GPU).
  4. Results are distributed back to the futures of the individual requests.

  • Constructor Details

    • NeuralNetBatcher

      public NeuralNetBatcher(AlphaZeroNet network, int maxBatchSize, int deviceIndex)
      Constructs a batcher for a specific network instance. * @param network the neural network instance dedicated to this batcher
      Parameters:
      maxBatchSize - the maximum number of requests to aggregate in one forward pass
      deviceIndex - the ID of the device (GPU) this batcher is intended for
